title: Teacher Education Philosophy and Blended Instructional Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Core principles of adult education and experience in operationalizing training within organizations
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based LMS access environment, requiring job-integrated project evaluations.

learning_goals: Proposing three blended instruction design plans (teacher-centered to student-centered) tailored to learners' job characteristics.
Developing and applying an assessment rubric reflecting educational philosophy to project-based evaluations.
Listing five or more asynchronous online activity strategies to promote learner engagement.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
